channel.title: [Class Suggestion] Overtaker - Neutral Offensive
channel.description:
**The Overtaker - Unique Neutral Offensive**
**Passive 1: Beyond Corruption** You can only die from Blue Dragon killer classes or by Execution. You will appear as a member of the Unseen/Cult. You may also talk with the Unseen/Cult in their night chat anonymous. They will not know you are there unless you speak.
**Passive 2: Pure Standings** If the Unseen/Cult is wiped out, commit suicide the following Night. You are immune to conversion.
**Day Ability 1: Bribe** If the Unseen/Cult kill tonight, force the person you bribed to do it instead. They will not be notified they were bribed. (2 uses)
**Night Ability 1: Forge Evidence** Make the Unseen/Cult and yourself appear Blue Dragon tonight. If you are not visited by an investigative class this ability fails. (3 uses)
**Night Ability 2: Tear Gas** Occupy all visitors to yourself or to an Unseen/Cult member. (2 uses)
Win Condition: Survive to see the Unseen/Cult win and take their throne. If you become King you will become an Evil King, keep all of your passives and maintain your win condition.
[Challenge Thread](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/suggestion-for-a-class-suggestion/38423/12) **Note: The Unseen and Cult lose if they were supposed to win but you are alive.**
[details="Changelog"] Tear Gas: Occupy all visitors to an Unseen/Cult member. > Occupy all visitors to yourself or to an Unseen/Cult member. Added uniqueness. [/details]
